display_name: Slow-Release Dihydropyridines Other Than Nifedipine Or Amlopidine (Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2))
description: Participant taking SLOW-RELEASE DIHYDROPYRIDINES OTHER THAN NIFEDIPINE OR AMLOPIDINE within two weeks of the Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2) visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.
